GetInstancePath (FUN)
GetInstancePath (FUN)
Â¶
FUNCTION GetInstancePath : STRING(255)
Returns the instance path of a module instance.
The instance path is built by concatenating the instance names
of all ancestors, starting from the toplevel module down until
to the given instance.  The instance names are separated by dots.l
If the resulting instance name is longer than 255 characters, an
empty string is returned.
InOut:
Scope
Name
Type
Comment
Return
GetInstancePath
STRING(255)
Input
itfM
IModule
The module instance for which the instance path is computed
(must not be 0)

rows.Comment:
The module instance for which the instance path is computed
